subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With the revered Japanese players Hiroki Kuroda, Ichiro Suzuki and now Masahiro Tanaka on their team, the Yankees are bracing for unprecedented news media attention from their home country.
snippet: With the revered Japanese players Hiroki Kuroda, Ichiro Suzuki and now Masahiro Tanaka on their team, the Yankees are bracing for unprecedented news media attention from their home country.
